newsitem.title: USA: India must cut budget deficits more - IMF chief.
newsitem.headline: India must cut budget deficits more - IMF chief.

text.p: India needs to do more to reform its economy and in particular to cut its big budget deficits, International Monetary Fund Managing Director Michel Camdessus said.
"India has to do more and can do more," he told a news conference on Thursday ahead of the start of the semi-annual meeting of the IMF and World Bank here.

He said that India had to tackle its big budget deficits, both at the central government and state levels and called the country's overall public sector borrowing requirement of nine percent of gross domestic product "unsustainable."
